expt_aim: Comparing two sentences with only one or two words changed
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
He thought the movie was good but not excellent.
The weekends were sometimes but not always sunny.
The player was skillful or hardworking.
Two but not three of the cookies were chocolate.
Some but not all of the shirts were striped.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
He thought the movie was good.
The player was skillful and hardworking.
Two of the cookies were chocolate.
All of the shirts were striped.
